TextEng: Might I ask your name, friend?
May I ask you some questions?
Who are you?
I would ask a question of you.
Tell me who you are.
Yeah, whatever. I have a question.
Who you?
Me have questions.
Goodbye.
I am called <FirstName>.
My name is <FullName>. Pleased to meet you, Captain Thurin.
Text: 제 이름은 <FullName>입니다. 만나서 반갑습니다, 투린 대장님.

TextEng: You don't need to know who I am.
Me is <FirstName>.
Me called <FullName>. Is nice to meet you.
You no need know me.
Text: 넌 나 누군지 알 필요 없어.

TextEng: What kind of problems are you referring to?
I'm looking for work, if you know of anything.
Text: 일 있으면 찾고 있는데, 뭔가 아는 게 있어?

TextEng: I have some questions about the plague.
I need some directions.
Me have questions about plague.
Me look for work.
Me need directions.
What problems?
Perhaps you could tell me who you are?
Who you?
Do you have any idea where he could be?
Text: 그가 어디에 있을지 짐작가는 곳이 있습니까?

TextEng: Have you had your men search for him?
Do you know where he was last seen?
What would the reward be if he was found?
I could look for him.
Sorry, but I'm not interested in this.
Think where he be, maybe?
You have guard look around?
You knows where he seen last?
What reward for finding, maybe?
Me could looks for him.
Text: 나 그 사람 찾아볼 수 있어.

TextEng: Me have no interest. Too busy.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> All right... but don't you think I should get some coin up front for my trouble?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 좋아요... 그래도 수고비로 선불 조금 주는 게 맞지 않겠습니까?

TextEng: Fine. But I want some coin now... or your friend might be dead when I find him.
Text: 좋아. 근데 지금 당장 돈 좀 줘... 안 그럼 네 친구 찾을 때쯤엔 이미 죽어 있을걸.

TextEng: I'll find him if I can.
I'll find Samuel and return him safely, I promise.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me think some coin for trouble good idea, no?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 수고비 조금 주는 거, 좋은 생각 아니야?

TextEng: You give some coin now. Or friend not be healthy when me finds him.
Text: 지금 금화 좀 줘. 아니면 내가 찾을 때 네 친구 멀쩡하지 않을 수도 있어.

TextEng: Me do that.
Me finds Samuel, me promise.
No. Have you heard anything more of Samuel, yet?
Text: 아니. 사무엘에 대해 더 들은 거 있어?

TextEng: I'm sorry, but... I'm afraid that Samuel died when he was being freed from Meldanen's prison.
Text: 죄송하지만... 사무엘은 멜다넨의 감옥에서 풀려날 때 사망했어요.

TextEng: He was in Meldanen's prison, but he was killed. Them's the breaks.
Text: 멜다넨의 감옥에 있었는데, 죽었어. 뭐, 그런 거지.

TextEng: Not yet, but I'm working on it.
Yeah, yeah, I'll get around to it eventually.
No. Maybe you hears something new?
Text: 아니. 혹시 너 새로운 거 들은 거 있어?

TextEng: Me sorry... but he die when me freeing him from Meldanen prison...
Text: 나 미안해... 근데 나 멜다넨 감옥에서 구출할 때 죽었어...

TextEng: Me free him from Meldanen prison, but he die on way. (belch!) Oh well.
Text: 나 멜다넨 감옥에서 풀어줬는데 나오는 길에 죽었어. (트림!) 뭐 어쩔 수 없지.

TextEng: No, but me working on it.
Text: 아니, 아직. 근데 지금 하고 있어.

TextEng: Me get around to it sometime, maybe.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Are you sure you can't afford more? This is your friend I found, after all.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 정말 더 못 줘? 내가 찾아낸 건 네 친구잖아.

TextEng: This is hardly a reward. You had better dig deeper, or else...
Text: 이건 보상이라 하기엔 형편없는데. 더 깊이 파던지, 아니면...

TextEng: Thank you. That will be fine.
No, there's no need for the reward. I was happy to do it.
Text: 아니, 보상은 필요 없어. 기쁘게 해 준 거야.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me thinks you afford more. Samuel you friend, no?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 더 줄 수 있지? 사무엘 네 친구잖아, 그렇지?

TextEng: No good reward. Me thinks you dig deeper or me gets angry...
Text: 보상 나빠. 더 꺼내, 아니면 나 화낼 거야...

TextEng: This is okay.
No, me no need reward. Me happy to help.
Text: 나 도와서 기뻐. 보상 필요 없어.

TextEng: Has there been anything odd happening in Blacklake?
Text: 검은호수에서 뭔가 이상한 일이 벌어지고 있어?

TextEng: Are you aware of any strange creatures in the area?
Text: 이 지역에 이상한 생명체가 있다는 거 알아?

TextEng: Any weird stuff in Blacklake?
You know 'bout monsters 'round here?
Go ahead.
No, let me ask you something else.
Yuh. You tells me.
Me ask something else.
<StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> It's not a threat. Just an encouragement to keep him alive should he be injured when I find him.
Text: <StartCheck>[통찰]</Start> 협박이 아닙니다. 제가 찾았을 때 다쳐 있더라도 살려 두라는 '독려'일 뿐이죠.

TextEng: If you had the manpower to do that, you wouldn't need me in the first place.
Text: 그럴 인력이 있었다면, 애초에 날 필요로 하지도 않았겠지.

TextEng: Nevermind, then. I'll look for him.
You can tries, if you likes.
Okay, me looks for him, then.
